title: OSSC CGL Jobs 2025 - Apply Online for 1576 Group B, Group C Posts
description: The Odisha Staff Selection Commission (OSSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 1576 Combined Graduate Level Recruitment Examination for Group B, Group C Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed Any Degree can apply for the OSSC CGL Jobs 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age ...
